Ra.Title: Timber!!
Ra.Description: Chop down your first tree.

Ra.Title: Benched
Ra.Description: Craft your first work bench.

Ra.Title: No Hobo
Ra.Description: Build a house suitable enough for your first town NPC such as the guide to move into.

Ra.Title: Stop! Hammer Time!
Ra.Description: Obtain your first hammer via crafting or otherwise.

Ra.Title: Ooo! Shiny!
Ra.Description: Mine your first nugget of ore with a pickaxe.

Ra.Title: Heart Breaker
Ra.Description: Discover and smash your first heart crystal underground.

Ra.Title: Heavy Metal
Ra.Description: Obtain an anvil made from iron or lead.

Ra.Title: I Am Loot!
Ra.Description: Discover a golden chest underground and take a peek at its contents.

Ra.Title: Star Power
Ra.Description: Craft a mana crystal out of fallen stars and consume it.

Ra.Title: Hold on Tight!
Ra.Description: Equip your first grappling hook.

Ra.Title: Eye on You
Ra.Description: Defeat the Eye of Cthulhu an ocular menace who only appears at night.

Ra.Title: Smashing, Poppet!
Ra.Description: Using explosives or your trusty hammer smash a Shadow Orb or Crimson Heart in the evil parts of your world.

Ra.Title: Worm Fodder
Ra.Description: Defeat the Eater of Worlds a massive worm who dwells in the corruption.

Ra.Title: Mastermind
Ra.Description: Defeat the Brain of Cthulhu an enormous demon brain which haunts the creeping crimson.

Ra.Title: Where's My Honey?
Ra.Description: Discover a large bee's hive deep in the jungle.

Ra.Title: Sting Operation
Ra.Description: Defeat the Queen Bee the matriarch of the jungle hives.

Ra.Title: Boned
Ra.Description: Defeat Skeletron the cursed guardian of the dungeon.

Ra.Title: Dungeon Heist
Ra.Description: Steal a key from the dungeon's undead denizens and unlock one of their precious golden chests.

Ra.Title: It's Getting Hot in Here
Ra.Description: Spelunk deep enough to reach the molten underworld.

Ra.Title: Miner for Fire
Ra.Description: Craft a molten pickaxe using the hottest of materials.

Ra.Title: Still Hungry
Ra.Description: Defeat the Wall of Flesh the master and core of the world who arises after a great burning sacrifice.

Ra.Title: It's Hard!
Ra.Description: Unleash the ancient spirits of light and darkness across your world enabling much stronger foes and showering the world with dazzling treasures (and rainbows!).

Ra.Title: Begone, Evil!
Ra.Description: Smash a demon or crimson altar with a powerful holy hammer.

Ra.Title: Extra Shiny!
Ra.Description: Mine a powerful ore that has been newly blessed upon your world.

Ra.Title: Head in the Clouds
Ra.Description: Equip a pair of wings.

Ra.Title: Like a Boss
Ra.Description: Obtain a boss-summoning item.

Ra.Title: Buckets of Bolts
Ra.Description: Defeat the three nocturnal mechanical menaces

Ra.Title: Drax Attax
Ra.Description: Craft a drax or pickaxe axe using hallowed bars and the souls of the three mechanical bosses.

Ra.Title: Photosynthesis
Ra.Description: Mine chlorophyte an organic ore found deep among the thickest of flora.

Ra.Title: Get a Life
Ra.Description: Consume a life fruit which grows in the thick of subterranean jungle grass.

Ra.Title: The Great Southern Plantkill
Ra.Description: Defeat Plantera the overgrown monstrosity of the jungle's depths.

Ra.Title: Temple Raider
Ra.Description: Breach the impenetrable walls of the jungle temple.

Ra.Title: Lihzahrdian Idol
Ra.Description: Defeat Golem the stone-faced ritualistic idol of the lihzahrd tribe.

Ra.Title: Robbing the Grave
Ra.Description: Obtain a rare treasure from a difficult monster in the dungeon.

Ra.Title: Big Booty
Ra.Description: Unlock one of the dungeon's large mysterious chests with a special key.

Ra.Title: Fish Out of Water
Ra.Description: Defeat Duke Fishron mutant terror of the sea.

Ra.Title: Obsessive Devotion
Ra.Description: Defeat the Ancient Cultist fanatical leader of the dungeon coven.

Ra.Title: Star Destroyer
Ra.Description: Defeat the four celestial towers of the moon.

Ra.Title: Champion of Terraria
Ra.Description: Defeat the Moon Lord.

Ra.Title: Bloodbath
Ra.Description: Survive a blood moon a nocturnal event where the rivers run red and monsters swarm aplenty.

Ra.Title: Slippery Shinobi
Ra.Description: Defeat King Slime the lord of all things slimy.

Ra.Title: Goblin Punter
Ra.Description: Triumph over a goblin invasion a ragtag regiment of crude barbaric pointy-eared warriors and their shadowflame sorcerers.

Ra.Title: Walk the Plank
Ra.Description: Triumph over a pirate invasion a group of pillagers from the sea out for your booty... and your life!

Ra.Title: Kill the Sun
Ra.Description: Survive a solar eclipse a day darker than night filled with creatures of horror.

Ra.Title: Do You Want to Slay a Snowman?
Ra.Description: Triumph over the frost legion a festive family of maniacal snowman mobsters.

Ra.Title: Tin-Foil Hatter
Ra.Description: Triumph over a martian invasion when beings from out of this world come to scramble your brains and probe you in uncomfortable places.

Ra.Title: Baleful Harvest
Ra.Description: Reach the 15th wave of a pumpkin moon where evil lurks among the autumn harvest.

Ra.Title: Ice Scream
Ra.Description: Reach the 15th wave of a frost moon where the festive season quickly degrades into madness.

Ra.Title: Sticky Situation
Ra.Description: Survive the slime rain where gelatinous organisms fall from the sky in droves.

Ra.Title: Real Estate Agent
Ra.Description: Have all possible town NPCs living in your world.

Ra.Title: Not the Bees!
Ra.Description: Fire a Bee Gun while wearing a full set of Bee Armor.

Ra.Title: Jeepers Creepers
Ra.Description: Stumble into a spider cavern in the underground.

Ra.Title: Funkytown
Ra.Description: Build or encounter a glowing mushroom field above the surface.

Ra.Title: Into Orbit
Ra.Description: You can only go down from here!

Ra.Title: Rock Bottom
Ra.Description: The only way is up!

Ra.Title: Mecha Mayhem
Ra.Description: Do battle against the Twins the Destroyer and Skeletron Prime simultaneously and emerge victorious.

Ra.Title: Gelatin World Tour
Ra.Description: Defeat every type of slime there is!

Ra.Title: Fashion Statement
Ra.Description: Equip armor or vanity clothing in all three social slots.

Ra.Title: Vehicular Manslaughter
Ra.Description: Defeat an enemy by running it over with a minecart.

Ra.Title: Bulldozer
Ra.Description: Destroy a total of 10000 tiles.

Ra.Title: There are Some Who Call Him...
Ra.Description: Kill Tim.

Ra.Title: Deceiver of Fools
Ra.Description: Kill a nymph.

Ra.Title: Sword of the Hero
Ra.Description: Obtain a Terra Blade forged from the finest blades of light and darkness.

Ra.Title: Lucky Break
Ra.Description: Survive a long fall with just a sliver of health remaining.

Ra.Title: Throwing Lines
Ra.Description: Throw a yoyo.

Ra.Title: Dye Hard
Ra.Description: Equip a dye in every possible dye slot.

Ra.Title: Sick Throw
Ra.Description: Obtain the Terrarian.

Ra.Title: The Frequent Flyer
Ra.Description: Spend over 1 gold being treated by the nurse.

Ra.Title: The Cavalry
Ra.Description: Equip a mount.

Ra.Title: Completely Awesome
Ra.Description: Obtain a minishark.

Ra.Title: Til Death...
Ra.Description: Kill the groom.

Ra.Title: Archaeologist
Ra.Description: Kill Doctor Bones.

Ra.Title: Pretty in Pink
Ra.Description: Kill pinky.

Ra.Title: Rainbows and Unicorns
Ra.Description: Fire a rainbow gun while riding on a unicorn.

Ra.Title: You and What Army?
Ra.Description: Command nine summoned minions simultaneously.

Ra.Title: Prismancer
Ra.Description: Obtain a rainbow rod.

Ra.Title: It Can Talk?!
Ra.Description: Build a house in a mushroom biome and have the Truffle move in.

Ra.Title: Watch Your Step!
Ra.Description: Become a victim to a nasty underground trap.

Ra.Title: Marathon Medalist
Ra.Description: Travel a total of 26.2 miles on foot.

Ra.Title: Glorious Golden Pole
Ra.Description: Obtain a golden fishing rod.

Ra.Title: Servant-in-Training
Ra.Description: Complete your 1st quest for the angler.

Ra.Title: Good Little Slave
Ra.Description: Complete your 10th quest for the angler.

Ra.Title: Trout Monkey
Ra.Description: Complete your 25th quest for the angler.

Ra.Title: Fast and Fishious
Ra.Description: Complete your 50th quest for the angler.

Ra.Title: Supreme Helper Minion!
Ra.Description: Complete a grand total of 200 quests for the angler.

Ra.Title: Topped Off
Ra.Description: Attain maximum life and mana possible without accessories or buffs.

Ra.Title: Slayer of Worlds
Ra.Description: Defeat every boss in Terraria.

Ra.Title: You Can Do It!
Ra.Description: Survive your character's first full night.

Ra.Title: Matching Attire
Ra.Description: Equip armor in all three armor slots

Ra.Title: Fae Flayer
Ra.Description: Defeat the Empress of Light responsible for all those flashy lights and glitter.

Ra.Title: Just Desserts
Ra.Description: Defeat Queen Slime giving the coup-de-grace to the sovereign of all that jiggles.

Ra.Title: Don't Dread on Me
Ra.Description: Defeat the Dreadnautilus murderous mollusk lurking beneath the surface of the sanguine seas.

Ra.Title: Hero of Etheria
Ra.Description: Repel the strongest forces the Old One's Army can muster.

Ra.Title: Infinity +1 Sword
Ra.Description: Obtain the Zenith the culmination of a journey forged into the ultimate sword.

Ra.Title: Boots of the Hero
Ra.Description: Obtain the Terraspark Boots forged from the finest boots of fire and ice.

Ra.Title: A Rather Blustery Day
Ra.Description: Fly a kite on a windy day.

Ra.Title: Quiet Neighborhood
Ra.Description: Enter a misty graveyard filled with the surly dead.

Ra.Title: Hot Reels!
Ra.Description: Drop a lure in a pool of lava for a pre-fried haul!

Ra.Title: Heliophobia
Ra.Description: Trick a gnome into turning into stone!

Ra.Title: Leading Landlord
Ra.Description: Meet with a tenant who's as happy as they possibly can be!

Ra.Title: Feeling Petty
Ra.Description: Deliver headpats to the town pet.

Ra.Title: Hey! Listen!
Ra.Description: Encounter a fairy.

Ra.Title: Jolly Jamboree
Ra.Description: What you're celebrating doesn't matter just throw a party already!

Ra.Title: Dead Men Tell No Tales
Ra.Description: You were so preoccupied with whether or not you could open the chest that you didn't stop to think if you should.

Ra.Title: An Eye For An Eye
Ra.Description: Defeat Deerclops the chilly one-eyed monstrosity from a foreign land.

Ra.Title: Feast of Midas
Ra.Description: Obtain Golden Delight the highest quality meal made from the highest quality . . . ingredients.

Ra.Title: Unusual Survival Strategies
Ra.Description: Delay death from drowning by drinking water. It doesn't make much sense but you did what you had to do.

Ra.Title: Black Mirror
Ra.Description: Obtain the Cell Phone. You'll never leave home without it again.

Ra.Title: Ankhumulation Complete
Ra.Description: Obtain the Ankh Shield the finest protection from unpleasant maladies and ailments.

Ra.Title: Torch God
Ra.Description: Invoked the wrath of the God of Torches and survived long enough to earn its blessing.

Ra.Title: A Rare Realm
Ra.Description: Some very special seeds can lead to unique and rewarding experiences. Can you find one?

Ra.Title: The Great Slime Mitosis
Ra.Description: Find all of the Slime Pets and have them move in!

Ra.Title: A Shimmer In The Dark
Ra.Description: Shimmer an item into another item. What other transmutations can you find?

Ra.Title: And Good Riddance!
Ra.Description: Completely purify all Corruption Crimson and Hallow from your world until the Dryad is satisfied!

Ra.Title: To Infinity... and Beyond!
Ra.Description: Fly a Kwad Racer into outer space.
